features: TRIPLE DEFENSE TECHNOLOGY: Dove Men’s Deodorant Spray offers powerful 48h odor & wetness protection, long lasting subtle scent, and 1/4 moisturizing cream to give you comfortable underarms
LONG LASTING SCENTS: Enjoy the clean, subtle, and long-lasting scent in our dry spray antiperspirant deodorant
1/4 MOISTURIZING CREAM: Dove Men Dry Spray Antiperspirant is formulated with 1/4 Moisturizing Cream to help retain skin moisture and help protect against irritation for more comfortable underarms
GOES ON DRY: Dove Men Dry Spray’s unique formula goes onto skin instantly dry, for a comfortable feel
HOW TO USE: Shake well before each use. Hold the dry spray can 6 inches from the underarm. Spray on underarm to feel the difference
CARE FOR THE PLANET: Each Dove Men+Care antiperspirant spray comes in a can that's made with infinitely recyclable aluminum. Dove Men+Care antiperspirants are PETA-certified Cruelty Free
body.description: Dove Men's new revolutionary formula offers powerful 72h odor and wetness protection, long lasting subtle scents, and 1/4 moisturizing cream to give you comfortable underarms. Enjoy the clean, subtle, and long-lasting scent in our dry spray antiperspirant deodorant. Dove Men's antiperspirant body spray for men is formulated with 1/4 Moisturizing Cream to help retain skin moisture that help protect against irritation for more comfortable underarms. Dove Men Dry Spray's unique formula goes onto skin instantly dry, for a comfortable feel. Shake well before each use. Hold the dry spray can 6 inches from the underarm. Spray on underarm to feel the difference. Looking for more Dove Men+Care skin care products? Try the full range of Dove Men+Care products, including antiperspirant deodorants, dry spray antiperspirant deodorants, body washes, face and body bars, and hair and skin care products. Dove Men+Care Clean Comfort Antiperspirant Deodorant Dry Spray can is made with infinitely recyclable aluminum. All Dove products, including this antiperspirant deodorant dry spray, are PETA-certified cruelty-free. Globally, Dove does not test on animals.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Men+Care Clean Comfort Dry Spray Antiperspirant

Work. Family. Travel. Life is fast-paced. That’s why we need an antiperspirant that can keep up If you want to stop sweat from dominating your day, try Dove Men+Care Clean Comfort Dry Spray Antiperspirant – a strong antiperspirant spray that helps fight sweat and odor for up to 48 hours. Its ¼ moisturizer technology helps protect skin against irritation, meaning you benefit from a clinically proven antiperspirant that’s tough on sweat, not on skin. Plus, it has a long-lasting clean and crisp scent. So the next time you’re powering through your to-do list at the office or playing soccer with the kids, your sweating will be under control. Finally, you’ll have a strong antiperspirant that works as fast and hard as you. Choose our Clean Comfort Dry Spray Antiperspirant to help keep you dry and fight irritation. Features: Tough on sweat, not on skin Goes on instantly dry for a cleaner feel 48-hour sweat protection ¼ moisturizer technology that helps protect against irritation 100% alcohol-free formula Clean, crisp scent

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars keeps stink away
reviews.reviewText: I like this because my grandsons and husband use it the boys have sensitive skin and this doesn't irritate them they are also teenagers and they sweat heavily the dove keeps them dry and they don't stink until the next shower

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Such a waste and does not spray right
reviews.reviewText: Hear me out. Something is off here. I bought some in the past and it worked fine. I think the 72 hour version is a new formula and jt sprays right. Mine just spray cold air and no deodorant comes out. Maybe sometimes the slightest bit but most often nine out of 10 times it just sprays cold airI bought six bottles of this and I’m so let down. When I first tried them out, I had the same issue. I tried one more time getting the 72 hour protection and it worked perfectly fine. I only went back to this one because it was cheaper and I thought maybe my first time was just a bad batch. However I’m on bottle already because it only sprays air. I probably won’t be buying dove spray anymore but I may try one more 72 hour just to confirm they changed the formula and it works much better. Maybe the original one and 48 hour and discontinued and it won’t be a problem and the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
